mapper.select: select org.audit,orgs.audit pAudit from im_account acc left join im_user us on acc.user_id=us.id left join im_org_user ou on us.id=ou.user_id left join im_org org on ou.org_id=org.id left join im_org orgs on org.PARENT_ID=orgs.id where acc.app_id='100000065' and acc.LOGIN_NAME=#{login_name};

select us.id userId from im_account acc left join im_user us on acc.user_id=us.id left join im_org_user ou on us.id=ou.user_id left join im_org org on ou.org_id=org.id left join im_org orgs on org.PARENT_ID=orgs.id where acc.app_id='100000065' and acc.LOGIN_NAME=#{login_name};
